description:
Duration of stay (as defined for naturalisations)

Explanatory notes for the following statistics:
12521 Statistics of foreigners

Definition:
The duration of stay is calculated as the difference between
the reference date and the date of first entry into Germany
or date of birth in Germany, not considering any
interruptions.


© Statistisches Bundesamt, Wiesbaden 2016
name: Duration of stay (as defined for naturalisations)
